name: @junctionrelay/shader-nostromo
description: MU-TH-UR 6000 phosphor terminal — amber CRT, scanlines, raster interference, data corruption glyphs

junctionrelay.description: Cassette-futurism CRT effect inspired by the USCSS Nostromo. Barrel warp, amber-green phosphor grade, chunky scanlines, drifting sync roll, raster ripple, thermal grain, heavy bezel vignette, and periodic data-corruption glyph strips. Fully self-contained.
